import LockOutlinedIcon from '@mui/icons-material/LockOutlined' import { Avatar, Button, FormControlLabel, Grid, TextField, Typography, Paper, Checkbox, } from '@mui/material' import EmailValidator from 'email-validator' import React from 'react' interface IProps { emailProp: string password: string } const Signup: React.FC = (props) => { const { emailProp, password } = props const [email, setEmail] = React.useState(emailProp) const hasError = React.useMemo( () => !EmailValidator.validate(email) && email !== undefined && email !== '', [email] ) return (

Sign Up

Please fill this form to create an account !
setEmail(e.target.value)} error={hasError} value={email} /> } label="I accept the terms and conditions" />
) } export default Signup
